yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Tracks | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="A Bruce fan's nirvana: four discs of never-before-heard songs, demos, and B-sides, a treasure trove of material mostly left on the cutting-room floor from his early auditions for John Hammond through his work in the 1990s." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/tracks/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Tracks" />
<meta property="og:description" content="A Bruce fan's nirvana: four discs of never-before-heard songs, demos, and B-sides, a treasure trove of material mostly left on the cutting-room floor from his early auditions for John Hammond through his work in the 1990s. Not a retrospective but an "alternate road map" and a glimpse at the ambition, development, and prolific creativity of a rock icon." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/tracks/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />
<meta property="article:publisher" content="https://www.facebook.com/brucespringsteen" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="630" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Tracks" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="A Bruce fan's nirvana: four discs of never-before-heard songs, demos, and B-sides, a treasure trove of material mostly left on the cutting-room floor from his early auditions for John Hammond through his work in the 1990s. Not a retrospective but an "alternate road map" and a glimpse at the ambition, development, and prolific creativity of a rock icon." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/1999/04/og-springsteen-tracks-front-1.jpg" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />

yoast_head_json.title: Tracks | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: A Bruce fan's nirvana: four discs of never-before-heard songs, demos, and B-sides, a treasure trove of material mostly left on the cutting-room floor from his early auditions for John Hammond through his work in the 1990s.
yoast_head_json.og_description: A Bruce fan's nirvana: four discs of never-before-heard songs, demos, and B-sides, a treasure trove of material mostly left on the cutting-room floor from his early auditions for John Hammond through his work in the 1990s. Not a retrospective but an "alternate road map" and a glimpse at the ambition, development, and prolific creativity of a rock icon.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: A Bruce fan's nirvana: four discs of never-before-heard songs, demos, and B-sides, a treasure trove of material mostly left on the cutting-room floor from his early auditions for John Hammond through his work in the 1990s. Not a retrospective but an "alternate road map" and a glimpse at the ambition, development, and prolific creativity of a rock icon.
